00064 /**
00065  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00066  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00067  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00068  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00069  *
00070  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00071  *
00072  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00073  */
00074 SelfCreate* CNFamilialAnalysisMethodSegmentOverlap::newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string>& params)
00075 {
00076     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00077     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00078     CNFamilialAnalysisMethodSegmentOverlap* pMethod = new CNFamilialAnalysisMethodSegmentOverlap();
00079     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00080 
00081     pMethod->m_fSegmentOverlapThreshold = setupFloatParameter(getType() + "-threshold", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00082 
00083     return pMethod;
00084 }

00094 /**
00095  * @brief Run the analysis.
00096  */
00097 void CNFamilialAnalysisMethodSegmentOverlap::run()
00098 {
00099     Verbose::out(1, "CNFamilialAnalysisMethodSegmentOverlap::run(...) start");
00100     CNCychp& cychpIndex = getCychpIndex();
00101     CNCychp& cychpMother = getCychpMother();
00102     CNCychp& cychpFather = getCychpFather();
00103 
00104     getIndexSegments().deleteAll();
00105     getMotherSegments().deleteAll();
00106     getFatherSegments().deleteAll();
00107 
00108     CNCychpSegments& vIndexSegments = cychpIndex.getCychpSegments();
00109     CNCychpSegments& vMotherSegments = cychpMother.getCychpSegments();
00110     CNCychpSegments& vFatherSegments = cychpFather.getCychpSegments();
00111 
00112     if (cychpMother.getFamilialCall() == 1)
00113     {
00114         Verbose::progressBegin(1, "CNFamilialAnalysisMethodSegmentOverlap::run(...) Mother's segments ", vIndexSegments.getCount(), 100, (vIndexSegments.getCount() / 100));
00115         for (int i0 = 0; (i0 < vIndexSegments.getCount()); i0++)
00116         {
00117             Verbose::progressStep(1);
00118             CNCychpSegment* p0 = vIndexSegments.getAt(i0);
00119             for (int i1 = 0; (i1 < vMotherSegments.getCount()); i1++)
00120             {
00121                 CNCychpSegment* p1 = vMotherSegments.getAt(i1);
00122                 if (p0->getDataSetIndex() == p1->getDataSetIndex())
00123                 {
00124                     if (p0->getChromosome() == p1->getChromosome())
00125                     {
00126                         double dSegmentOverlap = 0;
00127                         if ((p0->getStartPosition() <= p1->getStartPosition()) && (p0->getStopPosition() >= p1->getStartPosition()))
00128                         {
00129                             double d1 = Min(p0->getStopPosition(), p1->getStopPosition()) - p1->getStartPosition() + 1;
00130                             double d2 = p0->getStopPosition() - p0->getStartPosition() + 1;
00131                             dSegmentOverlap = (d1 / d2);
00132                         }
00133                         else if ((p1->getStartPosition() <= p0->getStartPosition()) && (p1->getStopPosition() >= p0->getStartPosition()))
00134                         {
00135                             double d1 = Min(p0->getStopPosition(), p1->getStopPosition()) - p0->getStartPosition() + 1;
00136                             double d2 = p0->getStopPosition() - p0->getStartPosition() + 1;
00137                             dSegmentOverlap = (d1 / d2);
00138                         }
00139                         if ((dSegmentOverlap >= m_fSegmentOverlapThreshold) && (p0->getSegmentType() != "Unknown"))
00140                         {
00141                             CNSegmentOverlap* p = new CNSegmentOverlap;
00142                             p->ReferenceSampleKey = 0;
00143                             p->FamilialSampleKey = 1;
00144                             p->ReferenceSegmentID = p0->getSegmentID();
00145                             p->FamilialSegmentID = p1->getSegmentID();
00146                             p->SegmentType = p0->getSegmentType();
00147                             m_vSegmentOverlaps.add(p);
00148                         }
00149                     }
00150                 }
00151             }
00152         }
00153         Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done");
00154     }
00155     if (cychpFather.getFamilialCall() == 1)
00156     {
00157         Verbose::progressBegin(1, "CNFamilialAnalysisMethodSegmentOverlap::run(...) Father's segments ", vIndexSegments.getCount(), 100, (vIndexSegments.getCount() / 100));
00158         for (int i0 = 0; (i0 < vIndexSegments.getCount()); i0++)
00159         {
00160             Verbose::progressStep(1);
00161             CNCychpSegment* p0 = vIndexSegments.getAt(i0);
00162             for (int i1 = 0; (i1 < vFatherSegments.getCount()); i1++)
00163             {
00164                 CNCychpSegment* p1 = vFatherSegments.getAt(i1);
00165                 if (p0->getDataSetIndex() == p1->getDataSetIndex())
00166                 {
00167                     if (p0->getChromosome() == p1->getChromosome())
00168                     {
00169                         double dSegmentOverlap = 0;
00170                         if ((p0->getStartPosition() <= p1->getStartPosition()) && (p0->getStopPosition() >= p1->getStartPosition()))
00171                         {
00172                             double d1 = Min(p0->getStopPosition(), p1->getStopPosition()) - p1->getStartPosition() + 1;
00173                             double d2 = p0->getStopPosition() - p0->getStartPosition() + 1;
00174                             dSegmentOverlap = (d1 / d2);
00175                         }
00176                         else if ((p1->getStartPosition() <= p0->getStartPosition()) && (p1->getStopPosition() >= p0->getStartPosition()))
00177                         {
00178                             double d1 = Min(p0->getStopPosition(), p1->getStopPosition()) - p0->getStartPosition() + 1;
00179                             double d2 = p0->getStopPosition() - p0->getStartPosition() + 1;
00180                             dSegmentOverlap = (d1 / d2);
00181                         }
00182                         if ((dSegmentOverlap >= m_fSegmentOverlapThreshold) && (p0->getSegmentType() != "Unknown"))
00183                         {
00184                             CNSegmentOverlap* p = new CNSegmentOverlap;
00185                             p->ReferenceSampleKey = 0;
00186                             p->FamilialSampleKey = 2;
00187                             p->ReferenceSegmentID = p0->getSegmentID();
00188                             p->FamilialSegmentID = p1->getSegmentID();
00189                             p->SegmentType = p0->getSegmentType();
00190                             m_vSegmentOverlaps.add(p);
00191                         }
00192                     }
00193                 }
00194             }
00195         }
00196         Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done");
00197     }
00198     Verbose::out(1, "CNFamilialAnalysisMethodSegmentOverlap::run(...) end");
00199 }
